abstractContent.text: This paper describes an experimental approach to Detection of Minimal Semantic Units and their Meaning (DiMSUM), explored within the framework of SemEval'16 Task 10.

entities.text: Detection of Minimal Semantic Units and their Meaning (DiMSUM)

abstractContent.text: The approach is primarily based on a combination of word embeddings and parser-based features, and employs unidirectional in-cremental computation of compositional em-beddings for multiword expressions.
